text:
@CNNPolitics @realDonaldTrump @VP @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse 

Trump, Pence, White House are lying to Americans about COVID-19 for political campaign reasons -- there are more than 20 states back to being hot spots -- the COVID-19 task force needs to hold regular news conferences again ...
